title: resistis the forgotten warrior
body:
hi i have came up with the best champion ever resistis the forgotten warrior he is played adc jungle and top he is best played top and jungle and is a good jungler because of his e which stops people from getting executed and is a good ganker 
and soz for bad grammer
passive - risistis's ranged attacks deal 80% of AD (exept on minions where it is 100% of AD) and are slowed by 20% and deal 20% true damage on crits his attack range is 600, his melee attacks have life steal starting at 5% scaling with upgrades on his Q

Q - risistis can swap between a ranged or a melee champion (a bit like nidalee and there is a point in this at the start of the match) 

W1 - for 5 seconds melee risistis can throw his karambit in a 300 unit radius dealing 20/30/40/50 AD + total AD champions hit are slowed by 25%, after the 5 seconds the karambits deal damge based on how many times he enemy champion has been hit.

W2 - shoots an arrow dealing 30/40/50/60 AD + 90% of total AD and roots all champions hit for 1 second.

E1 - go invisible for 6 seconds his next basic attack allows him to  jump towards the champion or minion dealing 50/60/70/80 AD + 80% of total AD

E2 - killing an enemy unit like a champion or monster or minion heal for 10/15/20/25 health

R1 - blinks to an enemy dealing dealing 110% of AD and slowing for 50% for 2 seconds (40 second cooldown)

R2 - for 10 second gain 110% of AD against all targets but no longer deals true damge (40 second cooldown)

with the ults the cooldown is shared 
i hope you guys enjoyed and i hope you will want to play this champion
gl on all your games!!

replies.body:
invisibility,true damage, ridiculous scaling more cc then a support, busted passive......

no..... plz no

well i came up with it in humantitties but which is worse this or a twitch vayne mix 

and also if riot used it they would fix it up
